pages.text: A ruby pickaxe is an incredible boost for the miner (not minor). As a later-game item, a ruby pickaxe will mine 9 blocks at once, discarding almost all the non-critical blocks (except 1), and saving ores, lapiz, redstone, quartz, and ancient debris. The fire that makes a ruby also drops a torch periodically when it is dark.

pages.title: Ruby Pickaxe
pages.text: Be careful not to mine yourself into a hole. Be a responsible miner.
To craft a ruby pickaxe is just like a typical pickaxe. Just use rubies as your element.

pages.title: Ruby Pickaxe Recipe
pages.string: At a crafting table, use this recipe. Happy digging!
